}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[Edimax iMax Pro CAX1800]] - ''AX1800 Dual-Band Ceiling-Mount PoE AP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/NDD9574791906 NDD9574791906] (2019-12-11), FCC ST (06/08/2020) :AX1800 (2T2R, VHT80, HEW80), 192.168.2.1, admin/1234, 12V/1A
*[[Edimax EW-7479CAX]] will likely be the model name used for this product. {{See also|Edimax EW-7473CAX|Acelink|Edimax}} {{FCC ST|06/08/2020|indexme.}}
